channel.title: Crash at game start with some mods
channel.description:
Hello,
my game crashes at startup if i have following mods installed on the latest Experimental version (122801): Light it up 0.5.4 and Refined Power 2.0.5. I hope that these mods will be updated soon. Does anyone have the same problems?
greetings jens

item.title: Crash at game start with some mods
item.dc:creator: @mrhid6 Mrhid6
item.description:
@mrhid6 wrote:

This issue has been fixed on version 2.0.8

Read full topic
item.source: Crash at game start with some mods

item.title: Crash at game start with some mods
item.dc:creator: @Benedikt_Plangger Benedikt Plangger
item.description:
@Benedikt_Plangger wrote:

Hi Jens, the problem with both mods is already known. mrhid6 the creator of Refined Power has already posted on the officially github site to publish a new fixed version of the mod sometime today. Light it up will maybe took longer so remove it in the meantime.

Read full topic
item.source: Crash at game start with some mods
